long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the MyRW web-app, A free but unique text rewriting tool. A tool that allows you to rewrite paragraphs, sentences and other
written material. Why spend hundreds of dollars hiring a writer for your blog posts and/or articles or purchase expensive software, 
when you can easily use this free tool right from your web browser. This will save your wallet and put you in control. 

Aside from the typical synonym swapping mechanism offered by most services, we provide you with added functionality. 

- try our super-experimental sentence format re-arranging via subordinate conjunction detection 
- the ability to add harmless wordiness to your sentences and phrases 
- rearrange sentence order, within your text work.
- Automatic Condense / Summarize Functionality.

Imagine what you can do: 
- Pull apart blog posts 
- Disect news articles 
- Mash-up content and get an edge
- Be more productive
- Stay ahead of the competition
- Attract more traffic to your blog
- Create fresh content
- Recycle old content
- Cheat on essays or writing assignments
- Swap in descriptive synonyms, that will make your document less boring.
- Summarize and Condense articles/paragraphs/sentences to 'get-to-the-point' and   save space.


Save your brain power for something other than work, and become more productive at the same time.
This do-it-yourself service takes the pain out of rewriting, performing conversions that make sense,
giving you ability to create Google search engine approved content even while duplicating other articles.
